Posts.Content: Or will I just be putting myself through extra discomfort?  Any one have any experience at all?  Thank you lovelies xx
Posts.Title: Cold Cap - is it worth trying with AC Chemo?

Posts.Content: Was diagnosed a week ago today and have been ok until today where I’ve got the shakes and the reality is setting in! I’ve been so positive till now that I suppose I have to have a down day but I’m now terrified ! Get my treatment plan on the 4th which is my house move day aswell and just keep thinking of things that can go wrong and if I leave my little lady without a Mumma  sorry to be a downer I think I just needed to write it down somewhere
Posts.Title: The Fear is starting to hit now

Posts.Content: Thank you so much ladies, I’ve pulled myself together a bit and the support and stories of people on herr that are still around living life and kicking the arse out of cancer is very reassuring !
Posts.Title: The Fear is starting to hit now

Posts.Content: Thank you so so much ladies for your amazing words and support !  Feeling better today and ready to kick butt and my BCN yesterday told me to remember it’s very treatable and they will be treating me with the intention to cure  Plus I have clear nodes so Ned to just focus on that and get through things the best I can  You ladies are truly inspirational and I’m so thankful I found this forum! Wishing you all an amazing Christmas and in New year It’s game on time xx
Posts.Title: The Fear is starting to hit now

Posts.Content: Thank you so much h ladies !  Ive told her I’ve got to have medication for an infection that will make me lose hair and she’s totally fine and going to help me choose a wig! Such a relief I have to say x
Posts.Title: Got Treatment Plan

Posts.Content: So I start 5 months of Chemo next week  4 x AC  with injections then onto 12 weekly sessions on Pacx with a portacath  Then onto mastectomy and reconstruction  I’m so terrified of breaking my little lady’s heart she’s 8 with losing my hair I’m beside myself x
Posts.Title: Got Treatment Plan
